text:
Cooperative Extension Service
University of Missouri
COLUMBIA KANSAS CITY ROLL A ST LOUIS
OFFICE OF THE VICE-PRESIDENT
For Extension
March 7, 1967
Mr. Sam Scott
Director of Broadcasting
KCUR-FM
University of Missouri at Kansas City
Kansas City, Missouri 64110
Dear Sam:
This will acknowledge your letter of March 2.
We have very fine relations with our entire Congressional delegation.
We are in touch with them on many matters and they usually support
our stand. In fact, each year we arrange a luncheon for the delegation,
and at that time we discuss a whole range of matters about which we
are concerned.
I will be in Washington within the next two weeks, arranging for such
a luncheon. When we do meet with the group, I will bring up the
matter of Educational Broadcasting, and specifically mention Radio.
Yours very truly
Ci B. Ratchford
Vice-President of the University
of Missouri for Extension
CBR:ch
UNIVERSITY OF MISSOURI, UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AND
COUNTY UNIVERSITY EXTENSION COUNCILS COOPERATING
